CatDescriptText: Full inscription on poster reads "Foster Parenthood, Happiness through sharing love and home with a child who needs a temporary family.  Babies...need love to grow on, they can't wait for love although they must sometimes wait for permanent homes.  Most important...love, understanding, belonging, mother, father, families...securities children need... foster families give.  Care of foster children is a partnership: family and children's service and 'career' parents board paid.  A United Fund-Community Chest Service."
TitMainTitle: Poster from United Fund reading "Foster Parenthood..." displayed on table, in interior with Pittsburgh maps in background

cutline: Foster Parenthood, Happiness through sharing love and home with a child who needs a temporary family.  Babies...need love to grow on, they can't wait for love although they must sometimes wait for permanent homes.  Most important...love, understanding, belonging, mother, father, families...securities children need... foster families give.  Care of foster children is a partnership: family and children's service and 'career' parents board paid.  A United Fund-Community Chest Service.
